Posts.EditableText: Hi. Does anyone know how to remove  the default "You are in" location description for Quest 5.8?  In earlier versions it could be done  via the 'automatically generate room descriptions' tab.  Unfortunately, there doesn't seem to be one for 5.8.
Posts.HTML: Hi. Does anyone know how to remove the default "You are in" location description for Quest 5.8? In earlier versions it could be done via the 'automatically generate room descriptions' tab. Unfortunately, there doesn't seem to be one for 5.8.

Posts.EditableText: It looks to still be there. But the checkbox will only display if "automatically generate room descriptions" is turned on.
Posts.HTML: It looks to still be there. But the checkbox will only display if "automatically generate room descriptions" is turned on.
